bike.description: ZR 9000 Alloy™ in a custom WSD geometry that increases comfort and power. Lighter than titanium, stronger than steel.

components.description: Bontrager Race, OCLV Carbon, 1-1/8" aluminum steerer tube, aluminum crown

Bontrager Race Lite: 23mm semi-deep front rim provides excellent aero; 21mm rear rim w/OSB improves lateral rigidity, prolongs wheel life; Fully serviceable Swiss-made rear hub w/cartridge and needle bearings; Cro-Moly skewers; Stiff, 14G bladed spokes; 7
Bontrager FS 2000 WSD, Cro-Moly rails, leather/gel
